long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension to easily select and download files from Piazza Resources page.

Piazza Resources Downloader will detect and list all the downloadable content on the Piazza Resources page.  

How to use:
1. Login to https://piazza.com and navigate to the Resources section
2. Click on the icon of the extension in your browser and select the resources you wish to download
3. Click the Download button to start downloading
